item.title: Developer Issue Tracking Scheme -- DITS
item.description: DITS (Developer Issue Tracking System) is a purpose-built issue tracker designed exclusively for individual software developers. It eliminates the “collaboration tax” of team-oriented tools by providing friction-less issue capture, sub-100ms interactions, and deep bidirectional Git integration, offering a keyboard-first, flow-state-optimized experience across web, desktop, mobile, and IDE platforms while ensuring complete data portability and user ownership.

item.title: Creating A Website
item.description: Well here it is. I finally built my first website, my own place on the internet. I have always wanted to build a blog and post interesting stuff, but could never find a good way to accomplish this. I have tried building Hugo sites before, but it never worked out. I tried using one of Hugo’s themes, but trying to modify one of those to suit my needs turned into a nightmare. Well, here I am again using Hugo to build a website and a blog, this time with the help of AI. Starting from a blank slate or trying to use one of Hugo’s themes just didn’t work for me. If I can get something I like to start with, then I have no problem taking off from there. What I have so far looks good and I like it. This is a work in progress and I’ll be making changes as I go along. I’ll see how it goes.
